dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.gui.form

Class AbstractMementoWidgetController

  • java.lang.Object
    • dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.gui.form.AbstractWidgetController
      • dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.gui.form.AbstractMementoWidgetController
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    SWTBrowserController, SWTButtonController, SWTCheckBoxController, SWTComboBoxController, SWTGroupController, SWTLabelController, SWTTableController, SWTTextController, SWTTreeTableController

    public abstract class AbstractMementoWidgetController
extends AbstractWidgetController
    This is the base interface for all WidgetControllers that need a memento path to a toplevel memento or memento attribute.

    This class provides various helper methods that allow to find out if th controller is responsible for certain paths, to filter a path list, to caluclate severity of errors and that like.

    Copyright (C) Elektrobit Automotive GmbH - All rights reserved

    Since:
    2009.a

      • getWidgetMemento

        protected Memento getWidgetMemento()
        Query the memento that is the toplevel memento of the widget eventually creating it.

        If the controller is not registered to a factory this method returns null

        This default implementation assumes that the path given to the constructor points to an attribute thus the memento is actually searched at the parent path of the given memento-path.

        Returns:
        The memento or null in case of an error
        Since:
        2009.a

      • doCanShowMemento

        public boolean doCanShowMemento(java.lang.String path)
        Checks if this controller is responsible for the given mementoId.

        The default implementation returns true if the given memento is on the subtree of the widgetMemento or they are the same. This is used for updating validation results or navigating to a widget.

        Example:

        • given mementoPath: "/" , this means the root memento
        • widgetMemento: "/table"

        The method will return false as the widgetMemento is in the memento tree not same or above the given memento. Please also refer to doMustUpdateView(String), which would return true for this example.

        Overrides:
        doCanShowMemento in class AbstractWidgetController
        Parameters:
        path - path to the memento to check (memento must exist)
        Returns:
        true if the widget is associated with the given mementoId, false otherwise
        Since:
        2009.a

      • doMustUpdateView

        public boolean doMustUpdateView(java.lang.String path)
        Checks if this controller must update if the memento for the given mementoPath is changed.

        The default implementation returns true if the widgetMemento is on the same branch as the given memento. This method is used for the update of the view.

        Example:

        • given mementoPath: "/" , this means the root memento
        • widgetMemento: "/table"

        The method will return true as the widgetMemento and the given memento are on the same branch of the memento tree. Please also refer to doCanShowMemento(String), which would return false for this example.

        Parameters:
        path - path to the memento to check (memento must exist)
        Returns:
        true if the widget is on the same branch of the memento tree with the given mementoId, false otherwise
        Since:
        2009.a

      • getMatchingValidationResults

        protected java.util.List<ValidationResult> getMatchingValidationResults(java.util.List<ValidationResult> results)
        Filter out paths that do not match this widget by calling doCanShowMemento(String) and return results for which this widget is responsible.

        This method can be used by AbstractWidgetController.doUpdateValidationResults(List).

        Parameters:
        results - The results handed in by AbstractWidgetController.doUpdateValidationResults(List)
        Returns:
        The filtered results or null if results was null
        Since:
        2009.a

      • getValidationSeverity

        protected AbstractMementoWidgetController.ValidationSeverity getValidationSeverity(java.util.List<ValidationResult> results)
        Query the maximum severity of the validation results for this widget.

        The validation results for this widget are found by using doCanShowMemento(String).

        Parameters:
        results - The results handed in by AbstractWidgetController.doUpdateValidationResults(List)
        Returns:
        The maximum severity for the the validation results of the widget
        Since:
        2009.a

      • mustUpdateView

        protected boolean mustUpdateView(java.util.List<java.lang.String> paths)
        Query if this controller is responsible for one of the given paths.

        This method is supposed to be used from AbstractWidgetController.doUpdateView(List).

        Uses doCanShowMemento(String) to find out if it is responsible.

        If more that 500 paths are handed in this method returns true

        Parameters:
        paths - The mementos to query
        Returns:
        true if mementos should be handled
        Since:
        2009.a

      • parseHTMLColor

        protected org.eclipse.swt.graphics.Color parseHTMLColor(org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Display display,
                                                        java.lang.String color)
        Parses an HTML color of the form '#' red green blue where red, green and blue are hex values.
        Parameters:
        display - Display to instantiate color for
        color - The color
        Returns:
        The parsed color
        Since:
        2009.a
